name: HeadsorTails
0:
”Alexa, ask heads or tails to flip a coin”
”Alexa, tell heads or tails to give me heads or tails”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: heads or tails
des: Sometimes we just can't make up our minds; times like these call for help! With this skill, just tell Alexa to flip a coin and she can decide for you!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
